sentences.english: The study of gene engineering of macrolide antibiotics have made the rapid and exciting progress.

sentences.english: Fatty acids were isolated from Arnebia euchroma for the first time and fatty acid lactones have been firstly isolated from Boraginaceae plants.

sentences.english: Macrolides are the effective antibiotics in the treatment of MP infection.

sentences.english: After the Lactone Coriariainjections, the EEG of all the rabbits showed the characteristics of theepilepsy type.
